Submodules

DDPG.CNN module

class DDPG.CNN.CNN

基类：Module

__init__()

Initializes internal Module state, shared by both nn.Module and ScriptModule.

forward(x)

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

备注

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

static calculate_cnn_output_shape(input_shape: tuple[int])
training: bool

DDPG.DDPGNet module

class DDPG.DDPGNet.PolicyNet(nb_actions, action_space_bound, action_space_boundMove, CNN)

基类：Module

__init__(nb_actions, action_space_bound, action_space_boundMove, CNN)

Initializes internal Module state, shared by both nn.Module and ScriptModule.

forward(status)

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

备注

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

training: bool
class DDPG.DDPGNet.CriticNet(nb_actions, CNN)

基类：Module

__init__(nb_actions, CNN)

Initializes internal Module state, shared by both nn.Module and ScriptModule.

forward(status, action)

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

备注

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

training: bool

DDPG.agent module

class DDPG.agent.Agent(nb_actions, action_space_bound, action_space_boundMove, actor_lr, critic_lr, tau, gamma, device)

基类：object

__init__(nb_actions, action_space_bound, action_space_boundMove, actor_lr, critic_lr, tau, gamma, device)

训练网络（真实）– CNN 策略 价值（评价）

actor

目标网络（预测）– CNN 策略 价值（评价）

target_actor

使训练网络和目标网络的参数相同

属性分配

DDPG.env module

class DDPG.env.RenderBackend(value)

基类：Enum

渲染后端

MATPLOTLIB = 0
OPENGL = 1
class DDPG.env.RoadEnv(num_road_agents: int, max_episode_step: int, region_min: tuple, region_max: tuple, observation_img_size: tuple[int, int], observation_view_size: tuple[float, float], action_step_range: tuple[float, float], headless: bool, shared_data: dict | None, render_backend: RenderBackend = RenderBackend.OPENGL, observation_center: tuple[float, float] = (0, 0), still_mode: bool = False)

基类：object

class MyTimer(parent: RoadEnv, name: str, level: int)

基类：object

__init__(parent: RoadEnv, name: str, level: int)
__init__(num_road_agents: int, max_episode_step: int, region_min: tuple, region_max: tuple, observation_img_size: tuple[int, int], observation_view_size: tuple[float, float], action_step_range: tuple[float, float], headless: bool, shared_data: dict | None, render_backend: RenderBackend = RenderBackend.OPENGL, observation_center: tuple[float, float] = (0, 0), still_mode: bool = False)

智能体运行环境

备注

请在道路、建筑、区域等加载完毕后再创建该环境。

（在创建环境时会自动缓存原有道路，并且在注册观察渲染器时会自动将现有的道路、建筑、区域等作为buffer传入，

而这些buffer后期将不再更新， 因此必须在道路、建筑、区域等加载完毕后再创建环境）

参数:

  • num_road_agents – 智能体数量

  • max_episode_step – 最大行动步数

  • region_min – 可活动区域的左上角顶点坐标（世界坐标）

  • region_max – 可活动区域的右下角坐标（世界坐标）

  • observation_img_size – 观察图像的像素大小

  • observation_view_size – 观察者的视野范围（世界坐标）

  • observation_center – 观察的中心坐标， 仅在still_mode==True时生效

  • still_mode – 摄像机是否静止，设为True时观察范围和位置固定， 并采用observation_center参数所提供的坐标作为观察中心， 否则摄像机跟随agent运动

  • action_step_range – 步长最小值，步长最大值

  • headless – 无头模式

  • shared_data – 共享的数据

  • render_backend – 渲染后端

clear_and_spawn_agents()

清除原来的roads， 并且生成新的road（起点）， 更新self.road_agents 和 self.agents_done

property done_in_ndarray_format: ndarray

兼容性操作， 返回符合train要求的numpy格式的done

注意：该操作不是计算done的方法，仅仅是将self.agents_done翻译为numpy格式

final_reward()

在这里计算最终的reward

get_image_observation() → ndarray

返回状态，为 图像 格式

render()
reset() → ndarray

初始化新的道路，分随机初始化、选定道路初始化(TODO)

reward()

在这里计算每一步的reward

step(action)

返回new_observation, rewards, done, all_done

DDPG.env.sequential_mode_init(num_agents)

顺序模式， agent一个一个跑

DDPG.env.sequential_mode_reset()
DDPG.env.sequential_mode_step(_) → bool
DDPG.env.synchronous_mode_init(num_agents)

同步模式，若干agent同时跑

DDPG.env.synchronous_mode_reset()
DDPG.env.synchronous_mode_step(_) → bool

DDPG.reward_agent module

class DDPG.reward_agent.RewardAgent(region_min: tuple[int, int], region_max: tuple[int, int], headless=True)

基类：object

reward值计算的Opengl实现版本

__init__(region_min: tuple[int, int], region_max: tuple[int, int], headless=True)
static backward_penalty(_is_forward)

如果回头，则扣分

bound_reward()
building_region_reward()

限制不能进入的区域,传入当前建筑图像与智能体位置 返回规则: 得分区间[-1,0],越靠近建筑越接近于-1

get_final_rewards(road_agents: dict[UUID, Series], intersect_with_road_dict: dict[UUID, bool])
get_rewards(positions, parent_roads, is_forwards, debug_dict=None)

每次step需要刷新的内容 先进行渲染，然后再计算reward

参数:

  • positions – 新生成的道路的最后一个点的位置（即智能体当前位置）

  • parent_roads – 智能体出生的道路

  • is_forwards – 是否向前

  • debug_dict – 用于输出debug信息，可以留空。格式为{i: {} for i in range(len(positions))}

返回:

graph_reward()
reset(parent_roads)

每一轮需要刷新的内容

road_reward()

限制智能体靠近出生道路,传入当前出生道路与智能体位置 返回规则: 得分区间[-1,0],越靠近路越接近于-1

static step_penalty()

每走一步，累计一个负分

terrain_reward()

DDPG.test.test()

class DDPG.train.MyTimer(name: str, level: int)

基类：object

__init__(name: str, level: int)
class DDPG.train.TrainMode(value)

基类：Enum

An enumeration.

WARMUP = 0
TRAIN = 1
DDPG.train.train(env_args=Namespace(data_path='../data/VirtualEnv/try2.bin', num_agents=1, region_min=(-40, -50), region_max=(500, 500), observation_img_size=(128, 128), observation_view_size=(400.0, 400.0), observation_center=(200.0, 200.0), still_mode=False, action_step_range=(20, 60), max_episode_step=50), train_args=Namespace(path_actor='', path_critic='', path_cnn='', path_buffer='', nb_actions=2, warmup_epochs=10000, train_epochs=10001, sigma=1.0, sigma_decay=0.9995, actor_lr=0.0001, critic_lr=0.001, tau=0.001, gamma=0.9, batch_size=64, buffer_capacity=10000, save_interval=10000, log_folder='', save_warmup_buffer=False), gui_args=Namespace(headless=False), shared_data=None)
参数:

  • env_args –

  • train_args –

  • gui_args –

  • shared_data – 共享信息 其中：slow_ratio: 1表示使用正常的yield， 0表示不使用yield（UI不会更新）， 数字越大，等待时间越长

返回:

DDPG.train.epoch_generator(epoch: int, mode: TrainMode, env: RoadEnv, agent: Agent, train_args: Namespace, replay_buffer: ReplayBuffer)

每轮epoch运行的函数, 对于warmup和train都是一样的，通过设置mode来区分 :param epoch:现在是第几轮 :param mode:训练模式TrainMode.TRAIN 或 TrainMode.WARMUP :param env: :param agent: :param train_args: :param replay_buffer: :return:

DDPG.train.agent_play(epoch, env, mode, agent, done, state, train_args, replay_buffer, out_data_buffer: list)
DDPG.train.agent_update(env, agent, replay_buffer, train_args)
DDPG.train.agent_take_action(env, done, agent, state, train_args)
DDPG.train.shift_reward(data_buffer: list[list], final_reward: ndarray)
DDPG.train.assign_reward_weights(x)

reward权重分配方法 :param x: 离最后一步的距离。 最后一步x=0， 离最后一步越近x越小 :return: reward分配权重

DDPG.train.calculate_episode_return(data_buffer)
DDPG.train.add_to_replay_buffer(data_buffer: list[list], replay_buffer: ReplayBuffer)
DDPG.train.save_model(epoch, train_args, agent)
